original_text: And the Lord said to Moses in Midian, “Go back to Egypt, for all the men who were seeking your life are dead.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 미디안에서 모세에게 이르시되 애굽으로 돌아가라 네 목숨을 노리던 자가 다 죽었느니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said to Moses in Midian,
for all the men who were seeking your life are dead.”
sentences.korean_translation: 네의 생명을 찾던 모든 사람들이 죽었기 때문이다.”
